content: this is a summary of a legal case in slovenia identified as case n° sodba vrhovnega sodišča rs ii ips 3052016 30 8 2018 the supreme court made a decision on august 30 2018 but the details of the case and the outcome of the judgment are not provided the legal procedure involved a cost procedure a first instance judgment and a review by the supreme court the final resolution of the case determined that two individual parts of a building specifically an apartment were divided equally between the plaintiff and the defendant the supreme court dismissed the application for revision and upheld the previous judgment the court explained that the defendants resources were acquired separately making the apartment their separate property the court also dismissed the appeal and the applicants claim for reimbursement of costs was unsuccessful

metadata.CASE_ID: Sodba Vrhovnega sodišča RS II Ips 305/2016, 30. 8. 2018
